description: Iccanobif numbers: add previous two terms and reverse the sum.
links: N. J. A. Sloane and Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000 (first 200 terms from N. J. A. Sloane)
maple: with(transforms); f:=proc(n) option remember; if n <= 1 then n else digrev(f(n-1)+f(n-2)); fi; end; [seq(f(n),n=0..50)];
mathematica: Clear[ BiF ]; BiF[ 0 ]=0; BiF[ 1 ]=1; BiF[ n_Integer ] := BiF[ n ]=Plus@@(IntegerDigits[ BiF[ n-2 ]+BiF[ n-1 ], 10 ]//(#*Array[ 10^#&, Length[ # ], 0 ])&); Array[ BiF, 40, 0 ]nxt[{a_,b_}]:={b,FromDigits[Reverse[IntegerDigits[a+b]]]}; Transpose[ NestList[ nxt,{0,1},40]][[1]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 15 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
